job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Title ML EngineerltbrgtDuration 6 Months Contract with extensionsltbrgtLocation Remoteltbrgt ltbrgtPLEASE NOTE As per the client requirement we need to perform 5 years background check Criminal Education employment check amp DMV Please confirm if you have no records in the background and you will be able to clear the background checkltbrgtJob Descriptionltbrgt	At least two years experience as a machine learning engineerltbrgt	Proficiency with Python Java languageltbrgt	Extensive knowledge of ML frameworks libraries and software architectureltbrgt	Indepth knowledge of mathematics statistics and algorithmsltbrgtKnowledge of CICD tools  Kubernetes is a plus
